text: Thomas Roland Matte (June 14, 1939November 2, 2021) was an American professional football player. He was a running back in the National Football League (NFL) in the 1960s and 1970s. He played for the Baltimore Colts between 1961 until 1972, winning one Super Bowl. He was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Matte died on November 2, 2021 in Towson, Maryland at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American football running backs Category:Baltimore Colts players Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh
title: Tom Matte
